data.name: Marvel Heroes 2016 - Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Pack
data.detailed_description:
In celebration of Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, this pack includes playable Star-Lord, playable Rocket Raccoon, costumes for both heroes inspired by Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, and more! Rocket Raccoon's new costume includes an update to his Groot summon, which enables him to summon Groot from Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2!

Also included are Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Fortune Cards which offer a chance at Drax and Gamora Team-Ups both inspired by the film. *Drax and Gamora are NOT Guaranteed in this pack.

Items Included in this Pack:


  • Star-Lord (Hero)
  • Rocket Raccoon (Hero)
  • Star-Lord Conquest (Default) Costume
  • Star-Lord Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Movie Costume
  • Rocket Raccoon Modern (Default) Costume
  • Rocket Raccoon Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Movie ENHANCED Costume
  • 10x Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Fortune Cards
  • 10x XP Boosts

Rocket Raccoon's new costume includes an update to his Groot summon, which enables him to summon Groot from Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows Vista 32/64, Windows 7 32/64, Windows 8 32/64, Windows 10 32-bit
  • Processor: Core 2 DUO 2.1 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.1 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 3GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 30GB*
  • Video Card: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible with 512MB VRAM (Nvidia 8800 Series, ATI HD3800 Series, Intel HD 3000)

*30GB is required for installation. After installation, Marvel Heroes will require 15GB of storage.
pc_requirements.recommended:
• OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Current Generation Quad Core (Intel Core i7, Core i5 or AMD FX Series)
  • Memory: 8GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 30GB*
  • Video Card:Discrete video card with 2GB of VRAM (Nvidia GTX 600 or 700 Series, AMD R9 or HD7900 Series)

*30GB is required for installation. After installation, Marvel Heroes will require 15GB of storage.

mac_requirements.minimum:
• OS: OSX 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 30GB*
  • Video Card: Discrete or Onboard GPU with 512MB VRAM (Nvidia 9600m GT, Intel HD 4000)

*30GB is required for installation. After installation, Marvel Heroes will require 15GB of storage.
mac_requirements.recommended:
• OS: OSX 10.10 Yosemite
  • Processor: Current Generation Quad Core (Intel Core i7, Core i5, Xeon)
  • Memory: 8GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 30GB*
  • Video Card: Discrete GPU with 2GB of VRAM (Nvidia GTX Series, AMD FirePro Series)
